Question: This person was the first African American woman on the covers of GQ and the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue.
Hints: In 1979, when this person was 6 years old, her parents divorced.
Tyra Lynne **** (born December 4, 1973) is an American actress, author, television personality and former model.
She is the daughter of Caroline London; now London-Johnson a NASA photographer, and Donald ****, a computer consultant.
